actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 10:30 a.m. on October 18, 2024.
Pursuant to section 521 of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1970 (2 U.S.C. 282), the Speaker appointed Warren Burke, Legislative Counsel, to succeed Ernest Wade Ballou, Jr., resigned.

The House received a communication from Ernest Wade Ballou, Jr., Legislative Counsel, Office of the Legislative Counsel. Mr. Ballou submitted his resignation from the Office of the Legislative Counsel effective at the end of November 3, 2024. The Speaker accepted the resignation.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable H. Morgan Griffith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
